title: Memory leak when doing backward with grad as yourself
body_html:
@zdevito You said you wanted to make a python repro?

void backward(std::vector<Variable> outputs) {
   variable_list varlst;
   function_list funclst;
   for (auto v : outputs) {
     funclst.emplace_back(v.grad_fn(), v.output_nr());
     varlst.emplace_back(v);
   }
   detail::engine.execute(funclst, varlst, false);
}

This will leak a bunch of Tensors and in general be very sad for whatever Variables used.
